pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Vegetation Databases and Treat Taxonomy // Handling of vegetation data from Turboveg (http://www.synbiosys.alterra.nl/turboveg/) and other sources (http://www.vegetweb.de). Taxonomic harmonization given appropriate taxonomic lists (e.g. the German taxonomical standard list "GermanSL", http://www.botanik.uni- greifswald.de/GermanSL.html).
